resources.string:
"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎The Google Privacy Policy describes the information that Google collects during your set-up and use of Chromecast. You can modify your Chromecast's privacy settings, such as whether Chromecast sends usage data and crash reports to Google, after you have set up your device by accessing device settings in this app.
By pressing “Accept” below, you acknowledge that you agree to the ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ and ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%2$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎The Google Privacy Policy describes the information that Google collects during your set-up and use of Chromecast. You can modify your Chromecast's privacy settings, such as whether Chromecast sends usage data and crash reports to Google, after you have set up your device by accessing device settings in this app.
By pressing “Accept” below, you acknowledge that you agree to the ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ and confirm that you have read the ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%2$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎This dogfood version of Chromecast is internal only and contains features that are not yet released publicly.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎Please verify your Chromecast: • is within 20 feet of this device • is powered on (via the USB cable) and has a white indicator light • is on the same Wi-Fi network as this device (if set up)
Please verify your Wi-Fi network: • allows new devices to join
If you still don't see your Chromecast, you can: • factory reset - hold Chromecast reset button down for 15 seconds
For more help visit: support.google.com/chromecast.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎Make sure your Chromecast is nearby, and check that \"Auto network switch\" in your Wi-Fi settings is turned off until Chromecast setup is complete.‎‏‎‎‏‎

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎The Wi-Fi networks for your Chromecast (‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%2$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎) and this device (‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎) are different. After setup this device will be connected to ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%2$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ so you can use your Chromecast.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‎Let anyone in the same room connect to your ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ without being on your Wi-Fi network.
It uses a combination of your ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%2$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ location and Wi-Fi to identify nearby devices.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎To connect to your guest's device, your ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ will automatically transfer the 4 digit PIN using a short audio tone you can't hear.
If the audio pairing fails, your guest will be asked to enter the PIN. The device owner can find the PIN in the Chromecast app.
You can turn off this feature at any time.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‎Could not find ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ on your Wi-Fi network. Please check your Wi-Fi settings. • If you have a dual band (2.4 and 5GHz) router - ensure it is not in AP isolation mode • If your router has MAC whitelisting enabled - ensure it allows this device and your Chromecast to join Please visit support.google.com/chromecast for more help troubleshooting this issue.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎Do you agree to share your Chromecast's serial number with Google to find your available offers?‎‏‎‎‏‎"
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎Unable to check for offers. Please ensure that your Chromecast is set up and ready to cast.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎This allows devices in the same room to cast without being on your Wi-Fi network. It uses a combination of your cast device's location and Wi-Fi to find nearby devices.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎Could not connect to ‎‏‎‎‏‏‎%1$s‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎ Wi-Fi network. Please set up your device again to confirm your Wi-Fi network detail.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎We couldn't authenticate your Chromecast. Please visit support.google.com/chromecast for help troubleshooting this issue.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎We could not communicate with your Chromecast. It's possible that your Chromecast and device are connected to networks that are unable to talk to one another. This may require a small change to your Wi-Fi router settings. Learn more here.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎We weren't able to discover your Chromecast on the network. This may require a small change to your Wi-Fi router settings. Learn more here.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎Google Play services needs to be updated. Open Play Store and check for available updates.‎‏‎‎‏‎

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎We cannot fetch the open source licenses from your Chromecast at the moment. Please try again later.‎‏‎‎‏‎
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‎Cast screen / audio enables you to mirror anything on your device to your TV or speakers.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎• Use your Chromecast's location to find relevant photos and other content.
• Allow your Chromecast to use your Google account to access your photos, customize backdrop content, and manage your preferences.
You can revise these settings later using this app.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‎Could not load your backdrop settings. Ensure you can connect to the internet and try again.‎‏‎‎‏‎
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎You have no albums in this account. Create albums and they will be available here.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎It looks like there's a newer version of this app. This feature won't work properly unless you update.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎Install some cast-enabled apps to start casting your favorite content to your TV & Speakers.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎We're unable to establish a network connection. Turn on Wi-Fi, and ensure your device is not in airplane mode.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎Sorry, we're unable to redeem this offer. It may already have been redeemed for this device.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎You may have accidentally connected to a Chromecast Audio that's not yours. Please ensure that your Chromecast Audio is plugged in, and your speaker is on the correct input.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎We recommend not proceeding with setting up this device until you can hear the sound from your speaker.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎You may have accidentally connected to a Chromecast that's not yours. Please ensure that your Chromecast is plugged in and your TV is set to the right input.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎To check the status of your Chromecast Audio, locate the LED light on the side of the device.‎‏‎‎‏‎

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‏‎‏‏‎Once your Chromecast Audio has finished updating, the LED light will turn solid white.
When this is done, you should see your Chromecast Audio on the Devices tab of the following screen.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎It looks like the update completed. However, this device may be connected to a different Wi-Fi network than the Chromecast Audio.
Please try connecting to the same Wi-Fi network as your Chromecast Audio.
When this is successful, you should see your Chromecast Audio on the Devices tab of the following screen.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‏‎‎Once your Chromecast has finished updating, you should see the \"Ready to cast\" message on your TV.
When this is done, you should see your Chromecast on the Devices tab of the following screen.‎‏‎‎‏‎"

"‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‏‎‎‏‎‎‎‏‏‎‏‏‎‎‎‏‎‏‏‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‏‎‎‎‎‎‏‎It looks like your Chromecast has finished updating and is ready to cast, however your phone or tablet may be on a different Wi-Fi network.
Please make sure your phone or tablet is on the same Wi-Fi network as your Chromecast.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
